decks.notes: This Boros Aggro deck focuses on aggressively deploying powerful creatures and burning spells to overwhelm opponents quickly. By utilizing cards like Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer and Galvanic Discharge, the deck aims to deal quick damage and maintain board control. Cards like Ajani, Nacatl Pariah and Voice of Victory provide additional support and synergies with the aggressive strategy. The deck also includes disruptive elements like Goblin Bombardment and Blood Moon to disrupt opponents' plans and secure victory. Overall, this deck excels in delivering fast and efficient aggression to dominate the battlefield.

The main concept of this UR Aggro deck is to quickly overwhelm the opponent with fast and efficient creatures and burn spells. It focuses on using cards like Dragon's Rage Channeler and Monastery Swiftspear to apply early pressure, while also utilizing cards like Lava Dart and Lightning Bolt for direct damage to end the game quickly. The deck also includes cantrips like Preordain and Mishra's Bauble to help dig for key cards and maintain card advantage. Overall, the deck aims to be proactive and aggressive in order to secure a quick victory.

This deck focuses on aggressive strategies using a mix of red, white, and blue/black/green cards to overwhelm opponents quickly. It utilizes powerful creatures like Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer and Scion of Draco alongside burn spells like Lightning Bolt and Tribal Flames to deal damage efficiently. Leyline of the Guildpact and Leyline Binding provide support by boosting creature power and providing control options. The deck also includes Consign to Memory for added flexibility and disruption. The mana base is optimized for consistency and speed, ensuring the deck can consistently execute its game plan.

The main focus of the deck is to quickly establish a board presence and apply pressure to the opponent through aggressive play. By utilizing efficient creatures like Monastery Swiftspear and Slickshot Show-Off, along with powerful spells like Lightning Bolt and Mutagenic Growth, the deck aims to deal damage quickly and efficiently. The inclusion of cards like Dragon's Rage Channeler and Mishra's Bauble help to maintain card advantage and keep the pressure on the opponent. Overall, the deck's strategy revolves around fast-paced aggression and leveraging the UR color combination to overwhelm the opponent.

The main focus of this deck is to control the game through powerful spells and disruption while utilizing a variety of colors to cover all possible threats. The deck includes cards like Force of Negation, Supreme Verdict, Teferi, Time Raveler, and Leyline Binding to maintain control over the battlefield. Additionally, cards like Wrenn and Six, Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student, and Faithless Looting provide card advantage and utility. The deck also includes a mix of removal, counterspells, and card draw to handle a wide range of threats and strategies from the opponent.

The deck focuses on ramping up mana quickly to cast Primeval Titan and search for lands to combo off with. The main strategy is to utilize Amulet of Vigor to untap lands and generate huge amounts of mana to play multiple lands in a turn and trigger landfall abilities. The deck includes various land tutor cards like Tolaria West and Green Sun's Zenith to find specific lands needed for the combo. The win condition is usually to use Primeval Titan to search for lands like Vesuva and Hanweir Battlements to create a powerful board presence and overwhelm the opponent.

Utilizing Eldrazi creatures and control spells, this deck aims to ramp up mana quickly while disrupting the opponent's game plan with removal and counterspells. The deck focuses on casting powerful Eldrazi creatures like Emrakul and Ugin to overwhelm the opponent and protect its own resources. With a mix of ramp cards, utility lands, and powerful threats, this deck seeks to dictate the pace of the game and dominate the board in the mid-to-late game.

This Modern Aggro - Affinity deck focuses on quickly deploying cheap artifacts like Ornithopter and Memnite to take advantage of cards like Mox Opal and Springleaf Drum for ramp and mana acceleration. The deck also utilizes Urza's Saga to search for key artifacts like Cranial Plating and Pithing Needle, while also utilizing efficient removal and disruption spells like Engineered Explosives and Sink into Stupor to control the board. Aether Spellbomb and Shadowspear provide additional utility and flexibility, making this deck a fast-paced and adaptable aggressive force on the battlefield.

This deck focuses on aggressively maximizing damage output through a combination of quick creatures and burn spells. It also incorporates creature pump effects and removal spells to maintain board control and pressure the opponent. The use of anthem effects and card advantage engines helps to sustain the aggression and overwhelm the opponent. The deck is designed to curve out efficiently and maintain a strong presence on the battlefield, ultimately aiming to close out games quickly before the opponent can stabilize. The mana base is optimized to support the deck's aggressive game plan.

This deck focuses on assembling UrzaTron (Urza's Mine, Urza's Tower, Urza's Power Plant) as quickly as possible to generate a large amount of mana. The main win condition is controlling the game with cards like Karn, the Great Creator, Ugin, the Spirit Dragon, and Thought-Knot Seer, while disrupting the opponent's strategy with cards like Dismember and Kozilek's Command. The deck also includes powerful Eldrazi creatures like Emrakul, the Promised End as a finisher. Additionally, cards like Expedition Map and Mind Stone help with mana fixing and ramping up to bigger threats.

The main concept of this UR Aggro deck is to quickly and efficiently deal damage to the opponent by utilizing low-cost creatures like Monastery Swiftspear and Cori-Steel Cutter, as well as burn spells like Lightning Bolt and Lava Dart. The deck focuses on being aggressive and controlling the board with cards like Slickshot Show-Off and Dragon's Rage Channeler, while also using card draw and selection spells such as Expressive Iteration and Preordain to maintain tempo and consistency. The mana base includes fetch lands like Scalding Tarn and Bloodstained Mire to ensure color consistency and smooth land drops.

The main concept of this Boros Aggro deck is to overwhelm the opponent with fast and aggressive creatures like Phlage, Titan of Fire's Fury and Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer. The deck also utilizes burn spells like Galvanic Discharge and Goblin Bombardment to control the board and finish off the opponent. Additionally, cards like Ajani, Nacatl Pariah and Voice of Victory provide buffs and additional damage to help push through for the win. The inclusion of cards like Static Prison and Blood Moon disrupt the opponent's game plan and give this deck a strong edge in the Modern format.

This deck focuses on setting up a powerful combo with Amulet of Vigor and Primeval Titan to ramp up mana quickly and search for key lands such as Urza's Saga and Gruul Turf. By using cards like Arboreal Grazer and Lotus Field, the deck is able to generate a large amount of mana and eventually combo off with cards like Scapeshift to win the game in a single turn. The deck also includes tools like Aftermath Analyst and Malevolent Rumble to control the board and protect the combo until victory is achieved.

The deck focuses on quickly flooding the board with artifacts and leveraging them to overwhelm the opponent. By utilizing cards like Mishra's Bauble and Mox Opal to generate mana and card advantage, along with aggressive creatures like Kappa Cannoneer and Memnite, the deck aims to put pressure on the opponent early in the game. Cards like Urza's Saga and Emry, Lurker of the Loch provide additional value and consistency, while cards like Engineered Explosives help control the board. The deck aims to close out the game quickly through a combination of direct damage and efficient creature beats.

The main concept of this Boros Aggro deck is to overwhelm the opponent with aggressive creatures and spells, while also utilizing cards like Blood Moon and Goblin Bombardment to disrupt the opponent's strategy. This deck focuses on a fast-paced playstyle, using efficient creatures like Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer and Guide of Souls to apply pressure early on. It also includes cards like Ajani, Nacatl Pariah and Phlage, Titan of Fire's Fury for additional support and damage. Overall, the goal of this deck is to quickly defeat the opponent before they have a chance to stabilize.

The deck focuses on quickly flooding the board with artifact creatures and generating card advantage through cards like Thoughtcast and Thought Monitor. It aims to control the board with removal spells like Engineered Explosives while boosting its creatures with equipment like Cranial Plating and Shadowspear. The synergy between artifacts and cards like Urza's Saga and Mox Opal allows for explosive starts and constant pressure on the opponent. The deck also has some graveyard hate with Tormod's Crypt and can protect its pieces with Welding Jar and Metallic Rebuke.
